attributes.action: The Kursaal should be reimaged as a Victorian  Pleasure  dome complex for southend on sea
attributes.additional_details:
My main aim of this petition is get the Department of  communties and Local Government is to get the council ot bring in new ideas for site like a Victorian Pleasure complex inside with new attractions like

Victorian entertainments of
Old Vintage penny arcade machines
Bangtella machines
Fortute teller machines
Other Victorian penny machines
parplor games  hoop games,
Victorian Gallopper Caroseul
Waltz
small

Mini Fun house

Shows jazz, Live music Victorian music
